Medivh.name: Arcane Rift
Medivh.description: Launch a rift that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.

Medivh.name: Force of Will
Medivh.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

Medivh.name: Portal
Medivh.description: Create a set of portals between you and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

Medivh.name: Poly Bomb
Medivh.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

Medivh.name: Ley Line Seal
Medivh.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

Medivh.name: Raven Form
Medivh.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations.  Activate your Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

1.name: Raven's Intellect
1.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana Regeneration by 100%.

4.name: Bird's Eye View
4.description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Activate to reveal enemy Heroes in the area surrounding Medivh for 10 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 50 Physical Armor against the next 3 enemy Heroic Basic Attacks for 5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Arcane Charge
7.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 30% more damage.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: The first time Force of Will absorbs damage, it deals 183 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Raven Familiar
7.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies that use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds for 114 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: The Master's Touch
7.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero, suppressing their attacks and Silencing them for 2 seconds. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

13.name: Winds of Celerity
13.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

16.name: Circle of Protection
16.description: An untalented Force of Will is also applied to allies near the target.

16.name: Enduring Will
16.description: Increases Force of Will duration by 33%.

16.name: Reabsorption
16.description: Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 50% of the damage it absorbed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 10% Ability Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Invisibility
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.
